name: Fabric Tote
description:
Large tote comprising antique textiles and either fringing or beading and pom poms.  Close zip with pocket inside and hemp backed and lined.
H - 78cm
W - 50cm
Beautiful and practical bag with textile from the Hill Tribes of Thailand.
This is a unique one of a kind bohemian treasure that was handpicked and ethically sourced.

name: Brightly coloured shopper
description:
Each one of a kind bag is made from antique textiles and leather. Some pieces of fabric can be up to 50 – 60 years old.  The fabric is made by the Hmong Hill Tribe people of Thailand, Vietnam and Laos, these artisans are known for skilled craftsmanship, creating textiles in bright colours and rich texture in needlework, cross stitch and embroidery.  They use the fabrics for their traditional clothing for ceremonial events such as baby carriers for births and weddings dressings and other important events.  All of the bags are handmade by skilled artisans and are of exceptional quality.  
Hmong livelihood has changed from Opium farming to hand-craft over the last two decades.  Purchasing these bags help economically empower woman artisans to improve quality of life and preserve tradition and cultural legacy in the region.
H - 85cm
W - 40cm
All bags are hand-made from up-cycled, hand-woven traditional embroidered clothing and baby carriers.  They are unique, eco-friendly, and most of all beautiful.

Please note: **All fabrics have been pre-washed and marking, irregularities, imperfect stitching or condition should not be considered an imperfection but a characteristic of the vintage fabric.**

name: Mia Bag
description:
Great little bag that is long enough to be worn across the body.  Gorgeous embroidered edging and fringing.
H - 88cm
W - 20cm
